charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE as to Count I (1)

charges.charge_disposition: The deft is committed to the custody of the Attorney General for a period of 120 months, to run concurrently with 42 months sentence imposed in KC case number KC 91-1-00614-4. An 8 year period of supervised release is imposed on the following conditions. No fine is imposed. A $50 special assessment fee is imposed. Deft is remanded to custody. (1)

The deft is committed to the custody of the Attorney General for a period of 120 months, to run concurrently with 42 months sentence imposed in KC case number KC 91-1-00614-4. An 8 year period of supervised release is imposed on the following conditions. No fine is imposed. A $50 special assessment fee is imposed. Deft is remanded to custody. (-1)
